H0.text: According to Greek myth, who built the labyrinth on Crete for King Minos. Daedalus

H1.text: According to Greek myth, who built the labyrinth on Crete for King Minos. Hephaestus

H2.text: According to Greek myth, who built the labyrinth on Crete for King Minos. Poseidon

H3.text: According to Greek myth, who built the labyrinth on Crete for King Minos. Taitle

A4.text: Daedalus created the Labyrinth on Crete, in which the Minotaur was kept.

A5.text: Ovid, in his Metamorphoses, suggests that Daedalus constructed the Labyrinth so cunningly that he himself could barely escape it after he built it.
